Name: Arcane Trials
About the game: Arcane Trials is a VR fantasy spell casting challenges game. With a refined set of spells and environmental mechanics to work with, you must make your way through levels designed to test your skills as a magic user. Only the most skillful and competent wizards will conquer the final trials. Dodge, fireball, punch, light and blast your way through the increasingly challenging depths of the ancient Arcane Trials. Will you have what it takes become a Master of the Arcane? The game includes over 30 levels and a beautiful soundtrack by the amazing Emma Rogers.
